newsArray.title: DU gets Tk 2cr from BCB for playground dev
newsArray.description: Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) on Tuesday handed over a grant of Tk 2 crore to Dhaka University for the renovation and development of Physical Education Centre ground, aimed at enhancing sports facilities for students.BCB Director Nazmul Abedeen Fahim formally presented the cheque to Dhaka University Vice Chancellor Professor Niaz Ahmed Khan at a ceremony held at National Sports Council (NSC) conference room.Youth and Sports Adviser Dr Asif Nazrul was also present at the event.Dhaka University Central Students’ Union (DUCSU) Vice President Shadik Kayem received the donation on behalf of university authorities and students.Officials from NSC and DUCSU were also in

newsArray.title: When Is India Vs Pakistan Match In T20 World Cup 2026?
newsArray.description: Pakistan is currently competing against the USA in their second match of the T20 World Cup 2026 in Colombo. The wait, however, is for the much-anticipated match between India and Pakistan, following Pakistan's recent reversal of their boycott decision.
creator: shaunak ghosh

newsArray.title: T20 World Cup | Cricket economics trumps the complexities of sub-continental politics
newsArray.description: The earlier state of limbo about the overhyped clash, between India and Pakistan in Colombo on February 15, was caused by an over-reaction from the Pakistan Cricket Board, which stated that since Bangladesh was removed from the championship, Agha’s men will not play against the Men in Blue!
